entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 6:30 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023
